name: DeleteGreenProduction
description: Delete Green Production with CloudShell Colony
author: Quali

inputs.name: colonyEndpoint
inputs.label: Colony server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Colony end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service connection of type 'Colony Service connection'

inputs.name: space
inputs.label: Space name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a name for your CloudShell Colony space.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the timeout for this step (in minutes), if your Green will not be deleted when the timeout is reached, CloudShell Colony will fail the task.

inputs.name: productionId
inputs.label: Production Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the Production you want to end. Use $(Colony.Production_Id) if you have the Deploy Production Green task in the pipeline.
